claim: The difference in their average ball control scores is 0.7999999999999972.
extra_info: difference of the average ball control = SUBTRACT(AVG(ball_control WHERE player_name = 'Abdou Diallo'), AVG(ball_control WHERE player_name = 'Aaron Appindangoye')); AVG(ball_control WHERE player_name = 'XX XX') = SUM(CASE WHEN player_name = 'XX XX' THEN ball_control ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(CASE WHEN player_name = 'XX XX' THEN id ELSE NULL END)
reasoning: The average ball_control for Abdou Diallo is 49.4 and for Aaron Appindangoye is 48.6. Their difference, computed with full floating-point precision, is exactly 0.7999999999999972, which matches the claim precisely.

	`id`	INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,

content.text: Good. Now let me compute the average ball_control for both players and the difference.

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/european_football_2.sqlite" "
SELECT 
  AVG(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Abdou Diallo' THEN pa.ball_control END) AS avg_diallo,
  AVG(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Aaron Appindangoye' THEN pa.ball_control END) AS avg_appindangoye,
  AVG(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Abdou Diallo' THEN pa.ball_control END) - AVG(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Aaron Appindangoye' THEN pa.ball_control END) AS difference
FROM Player p
JOIN Player_Attributes pa ON p.player_api_id = pa.player_api_id
WHERE p.player_name IN ('Abdou Diallo', 'Aaron Appindangoye');
"
input.description: Compute average ball_control for both players and their difference

content.text: Let me also verify using the exact formula from the hint (SUM/COUNT approach) and check the exact floating point value:

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/european_football_2.sqlite" "
SELECT 
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Abdou Diallo' THEN pa.ball_control ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Abdou Diallo' THEN pa.id ELSE NULL END) AS avg_diallo,
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Aaron Appindangoye' THEN pa.ball_control ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Aaron Appindangoye' THEN pa.id ELSE NULL END) AS avg_appindangoye,
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Abdou Diallo' THEN pa.ball_control ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Abdou Diallo' THEN pa.id ELSE NULL END) - CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Aaron Appindangoye' THEN pa.ball_control ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Aaron Appindangoye' THEN pa.id ELSE NULL END) AS difference
FROM Player p
JOIN Player_Attributes pa ON p.player_api_id = pa.player_api_id
WHERE p.player_name IN ('Abdou Diallo', 'Aaron Appindangoye');
"
input.description: Compute using SUM/COUNT formula from hint

content.text: Let me check with higher precision output:

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/european_football_2.sqlite" "
SELECT printf('%.16f',
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Abdou Diallo' THEN pa.ball_control ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Abdou Diallo' THEN pa.id ELSE NULL END) - CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Aaron Appindangoye' THEN pa.ball_control ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(CASE WHEN p.player_name = 'Aaron Appindangoye' THEN pa.id ELSE NULL END)
) AS difference
FROM Player p
JOIN Player_Attributes pa ON p.player_api_id = pa.player_api_id
WHERE p.player_name IN ('Abdou Diallo', 'Aaron Appindangoye');
"

content.text:
The computed difference with full precision is `0.7999999999999972`, which exactly matches the claim's value of `0.7999999999999972`.
